# chamferProfile

**Instance Property**

A path that determines the cross-sectional contour of each chamfered edge.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var chamferProfile: NSBezierPath? { get set }
```

```swift
@NSCopying var chamferProfile: UIBezierPath? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property must be a two-dimensional path starting at the point `{1, 0}` and ending at the point `{0, 1}`, determining the contour of the shape along its extruded sides, as illustrated in the figure below. If the value of this property is `nil` and the value of the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNShape/chamferRadius] property is greater than zero, SceneKit uses a chamfer profile in the shape of a quarter circle.



## Chamfering a Shape

- **chamferMode**: A constant specifying which ends of the extruded shape’s profile are chamfered.
- **SCNChamferMode**: Options for which edges of an extruded shape are chamfered, used by the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNShape/chamferMode] property.
- **chamferRadius**: The width or depth of each chamfered edge. Animatable.
